resources.string: Do something that makes you feel good.
Your mother was a hamster and your father smelled of cranberries. I fart in your general direction.
Русский военный корабль, иди на хуй!
Remember to water the plants, and yourself.
I see the crystal raindrops fall and the beauty of it all, I wanna spend some time with you.
Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down.
